name: Archetype API
credits: Huge huge huge thanks to: Kio for helping me figure out gson, fiiiiilth for neow patching help, Jin for making the selection screens actually work, Vex for archetype card decision, Rattus for playetesting and wiki help, and all of #modding for being nice ^_^
description: An API for Slay the Spire to select/add card Archetypes for any characters.
